comments:
When working on JSP files with the myEclipse plugin, I pressed the "delete" key, 
adn this dialog box comes up. It says "The command for the key you pressed 
failed \n\nReason: 0" (ok).

I use: eclipse: Version: 3.0.1
Build id: 200409161125

and myEclipse: Version: 3.8.4
Build id: 200501171200-3.8.4

Uses Java J2SE5 (1.5.0) and J2EE 1.4

Created an attachment (id=18689)
error dialog box

Here is the dialog that appeared when the errors started popping up

I think you need to open a bug report against the owners of com.ibm.sse.model. 
It is possible that it is due to an underlying SWT bug, however, we do not 
have the source for com.ibm.sse.model to figure out what is going on in this 
case.  Please persue it with the developers of that plugin.
